card1.name: Sabotage 1
card1.description: Destroy key infrastructure to destabilize the region

card2.name: Sabotage 2
card2.description: Initiate a series of protests to disrupt order

card3.name: Sabotage 3
card3.description: Lead a rebellion to overthrow governmental structures

card4.name: Chaos 1
card4.description: Spread misinformation to create confusion and unrest

card5.name: Chaos 2
card5.description: Fuel riots and rebellion to further destabilize regions

card6.name: Chaos 3
card6.description: Overthrow key figures to plunge society into anarchy

card7.name: Looting
card7.description: Gain resources from widespread looting and chaos

card8.name: Anarchist Network
card8.description: Activate a network of underground supporters for sabotage

card9.name: Black Market
card9.description: Trade stolen goods on the black market for influence

card10.name: Civil Disobedience
card10.description: Organize mass vandalism to drain influence from the Tycoons

card11.name: Disrupt the System
card11.description: Create widespread unrest to disrupt the Activists' efforts

card12.name: Revolution
card12.description: Unleash full-scale boycot to diminish the Tycoons' control

card13.name: Revolutionary Forces
card13.description: Unite rebellious groups to strike down the Activists
